dublin_core.dcvalue: Marc Mitchell, President, D-tree International, Email: mmitchel@hsph.harvard.edu | Ken Warman, Gates Foundation, Email: ken.warman@gatesfoundation.org

mHealth for Safer Deliveries is a set of services that enables traditional birth attendants (TBAs) and midwives to ensure safe pregnancies and deliveries by identifying obstetric emergencies and utilizing Ezy Pesa to transfer money for obstetric-related transportation.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:59Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 easy_pesa.pdf: 295013 bytes, checksum: bbfd1abf8121dc91623393dc6ab500ad (MD5)
The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation
mHealth For Safer Deliveries: EZY Pesa Mobile Banking Service
Electronic decision support, Financial transactions and incentives, Provider-to-provider communication, Provider training and education, Maternal Health
